title: Pork, prawn and mushroom crispy dumplings
ingredients: ['25g dried wood ear mushrooms', '120g fresh mushrooms, trimmed and chopped', '5 spring onions, chopped', '70g rocket, chopped', '70g pea shoots, chopped', 'minced root ginger, to taste', '500g prawns, chopped', '1kg minced pork', '1 medium egg', '3 tablespoons light soy sauce', '3 tablespoons cooking wine', '3 tablespoons sesame oil', 'salt to taste', '1 packet dumpling wrappers', 'oil for frying']
